gifts.name: Bed jacket
gifts.description: Made by one of the few remaining underwear factories in the UK and using English lace, his beautiful silk bedjacket is too good to wear only at night

gifts.name: Leather satchel
gifts.description: An old-school design from a lovely company specialising in hand-built bikes and accessories. It also has a smaller satchel – and do check out its stunning bikes

gifts.name: Knitted dinosaur
gifts.description: A friendly dinosaur and some doughnut rattles from Best Year's crochet range – all of which are made in fair-trade conditions

gifts.name: A-Z jigsaw
gifts.description: Little hands will love fitting the letters into the right slots – slightly older ones will enjoy methodically assembling the alphabet

gifts.name: Beauty treat
gifts.description: A miniature pampering gift that can also be hung on the tree. Contains a bath and shower oil that promises to enhance feelings of sociability – and who doesn't need that come Christmas Day evening?

gifts.name: Beauty subscription
gifts.description: If you're not sure what beauty products to buy as gifts, how about a subscription that selects the best products for individual needs? The recipient will get a beautifully packaged box every month full of well-known brands, as well as tips and content on the website

gifts.name: Gift subscription
gifts.description: A unique and beautifully designed magazine for kids, totally unlike anything else on the market. The illustrations are beautiful enough to please the most finickity parent, and fun enough to engage children. The recommended reading age is around five to 10 but this can be interpreted pretty loosely. A gift subscription of £26 is for four issues, or you can also sign up for eight

gifts.name: Child's rucksack
gifts.description: A striking graphic design perfect for little animal lovers, this rucksack is screen printed on organic cotton. A monkey, owl or squirrel is also available

gifts.name: Knit your own dog
gifts.description: All the instructions you need to knit your own dog – from spaniel to old English sheepdog. Even if you don't knit, the photos of the knitted dogs are adorable. And if you are reeling in horror, don't worry, there's a Knit your Own Cat version too

gifts.name: Knitting kit
gifts.description: This kit contains everything you need to know to start casting off, all wrapped up in a sweet suitcase. As well as instructions you also get four balls of wool, bamboo needles, two needle kits with plastic and metal sewing needles and pins, felt squares and buttons. Lovely for junior crafters too

gifts.name: Stationery advent calendar
gifts.description: A truly luxury gift for a stationery fetishist – they had better not expect anything on Christmas Day after this advent gift. Among other treats are traditional Japanese scissors, a Fürst mechanical pencil and a Leuchturm tiny address book

gifts.name: Tree decoration
gifts.description: Put a pooch in your tree with this sweet felt decoration (also available is a very fetching Christmas pud)

gifts.name: Thermos flask
gifts.description: Everyone needs a nice vacuum flask for picnics, road trips, or hot chocolate in the playground. The cap doubles up as a drinking cup and the design is sweet enough for kids but also works for adults. Holds 350ml, and is BPA free

gifts.name: Carving set
gifts.description: Serious foodies will argue for hours on the relative merits of knives. These Japanese steel ones were selected by the founder of London's Divertimenti cookshop – but browse the rest of the site for more sharp suggestions

gifts.name: Illustrated cleaning cloth
gifts.description: Yes, it's a cleaning cloth. Bear with us. This is a truly beautifully illustrated cleaning cloth – there are numerous different designs – perfect for design lovers and gadget hoarders. A very clever idea and both a stylish and genuinely useful gift

gifts.name: Laptop sleeve
gifts.description: What to get the gadget lover who has everything? A luxury leather and tweed laptop sleeve in which to home their beloved laptop

gifts.name: Silver acorn pendant
gifts.description: Sterling silver pendant with a 16" chain. Seek and Adore is packed with gorgeous gifts from British designer-makers, so do have a browse

gifts.name: Dreaming cat necklace
gifts.description: Black and white plastic (with waterproof varnish) and silver-plated chain, packaged in a hand-stamped giftbox

gifts.name: Stationery set
gifts.description: Beautifully handmade in the UK, this wooden box contains 10 sheets of letterpress paper, 10 plain sheets, 5 correspondence cards and 15 envelopes. So that's the thank-you cards sorted, too.

gifts.name: Notecard sets
gifts.description: The V&A shop cannot be beaten for stylish, reasonably priced gifts based on classic designs. Set of 12 notecards with floral designs in a neat box.

gifts.name: Mum and baby gift set
gifts.description: Got an expectant or new mum to shop for? This nightgown is made from soft, comfortable fabric and the sweet matching babygrow is in a unisex design

gifts.name: Cashmere cardigan
gifts.description: Because babies deserve a bit of stylish luxury too. Unlike most cashmere, this supersoft cardigan can be machine washed. Available in sizes up to five years, there's also a matching blanket

gifts.name: Child's apron
gifts.description: A sweet apron perfect for junior chefs, bakers or enthusiastic painters

gifts.name: Skittle set
gifts.description: Dear Zoo is a perennial favourite with young children, and this soft skittle set brings the characters to life. Comes in a little storage bag for handy transportation indoors and out

gifts.name: Dinner set
gifts.description: Bring the scenery to the dinner table with this charming dinner set. Colourful enough for kids but also beautifully designed, so will please picky parents too

gifts.name: Mobile
gifts.description: A charming and unusual luminous mobile featuring nocturnal woodland creatures, made from colourful polypropylene. Comes part-assembled with instructions for the remainder of the construction. Perfect for a nursery or a young child's bedroom

gifts.name: Dog on wheels
gifts.description: The pull-along toy is a always a winner with young walkers, and this dog is particularly adorable. Made from fluffy strokable fleece, you'll want to take him for walkies too

gifts.name: Tiger cushion
gifts.description: While they are too young to understand the concept of Christmas, get something nice for a baby's room instead. This tiger cushion will see them through a good many years before they claim to be too grown up for it

gifts.name: Soft bear
gifts.description: Softer than a sheep that has been through the tumble dryer on super-soft cycle and then back-combed through a cloud of cottonwool, this adorable range of bears are flat so they can be snuggled up to and used as mini pillows by adults and children alike. Buy one as a gift, but we warn you: you'll want to keep it

gifts.name: Gruffalo mug set
gifts.description: Oh dear! Oh no! It's a Gruffalo … If this means nothing to you, don't worry, it will for anyone about half your height. Perfect for a warming hot chocolate and biscuit treat on a cold winter's day

gifts.name: Hobby horse
gifts.description: Get traditional with a hobby horse – this simple and very reasonably-priced design comes in either floral print or chunky brown cord for a plainer equine look

gifts.name: World-map print
gifts.description: A wonderful unframed print featuring animals, from designer Katie Viggers – this is a charming and quirky take on a world map

gifts.name: Bear-family print
gifts.description: Perfect for ursine lovers of all ages, this print features a quirky spin on the different members of the bear family

gifts.name: Winter animals
gifts.description: Beautiful designs hand-stitched using organic cotton and eco-fi felt (made from waste plastic bottles); these cushions are made with love and to last a lifetime

gifts.name: Velour hat
gifts.description: A soft, organic, velour beanie hat featuring thunderbolts and lightning, very very frightening. Except not frightening at all. Just cute. Comes in sizes up to five years, though sizing is approximate (based on head circumference) so check the charts.

gifts.name: Landscape scene rompers
gifts.description: Smafolk makes awesome prints for young kids – this truly bucolic romper is for babies to, well, romp in. The fabric is Oeko-tex certified free from harmful substances, too. So basically it's an organic farm

gifts.name: Shape sorter
gifts.description: Sweet, robust shape sorter for young children with the ever-adorable Miffy and friends on the sides

gifts.name: Soft plush doll
gifts.description: Avoid the sinister gaze of plastic dolls with a softer, more appealing doll. She can be accessorised with various other items – and machine washed, for added practicality

gifts.name: Jumping Peppa
gifts.description: You want to buy them traditionally crafted wooden toys handmade by the latest in a generation of craftsman residing in a remote rural idyll? Tough, this is what they actually want: a Peppa Pig who jumps enthusiastically in muddy puddles. Give in

gifts.name: Rocking horse
gifts.description: The perfect combination of vintage appeal and child-friendly design, this beautiful little horse is durable and solid enough to be used from a very early age (around 9 months plus) and is low enough to allow little legs to clamber on. Doodle the horse even has a friend, Crumb the bird, to keep him company

gifts.name: Adaptable trike
gifts.description: A fantastic present for a pushchair-phobic baby, the Smart Trike adapts with them as they grow, from pushable and strapped-in safety as a baby to solo trike action as a toddler. It has good suspension for comfort and is extremely easy and quick to assemble. No batteries required and will last years

gifts.name: Spherevelo
gifts.description: A future design classic that will have passing babies turn their heads in envy, this bike, suitable for kids from around 12-30 months, is the perfect introduction to the balance bike

gifts.name: Teal soft toy
gifts.description: Most merchandise from kids TV programmes is not what you would call sweet: appealing to sticky fingers, yes, but definitely not their parents. These are an exception. In the same retro style as the CBeebies programme, the Abney and Teal soft toys are cuddly and appealing to fans and non-fans alike

gifts.name: Mittens on a string
gifts.description: Things they don't make like they used to: wooden toys, shoes, stringed mittens. Well, actually, turns out Toby Tiger does. Hooray! An end to lost gloves

gifts.name: Magnetic stacking rocket
gifts.description: A simple and easy design, this wooden rocket is constructed from magnetic layers that young children can easily take apart and reassemble (though not necessarily in the right order)

gifts.name: Soft hot water bottle
gifts.description: A very cuddly winter warmer for older children and teenagers who still have a soft side (or are at least prepared to admit it)

gifts.name: Set of suitcases
gifts.description: Adorned with lovely illustrations of birds, these little suitcases are a great toy for children or a nice storage idea for teens – they'd be good for jewellery or tidying up small objects (well, you can but dream)

gifts.name: Knitted jumper
gifts.description: Everyone needs a Christmas jumper, and this one is festive enough for the day itself but not too decked in holly/Santa/reindeer, so will also be suitable for normal winter wear. Though if you want to wear a reindeer jumper in January, don't let us stop you

gifts.name: Cut-out birds
gifts.description: A photographic representation of birds, to cut out and stick together. A very cool stocking filler, for kids or adults. There's also a birds of prey set

gifts.name: Card colouring-in sets
gifts.description: A great, simple idea: Carddies consist of a set of card people in a box which children can carry around with them and colour in on the go. Brilliant for fidgety kids on planes, trains, in restaurants or just for some nice quiet time at home. You can but dream

gifts.name: Chalkboard T-shirts
gifts.description: A T-shirt you are actually supposed to draw on? Admit it, you wish it came in adult sizes too. Just wipe off the drawings with a damp cloth so they can start all over again

gifts.name: Clothes plasters
gifts.description: Another one of those brilliantly simple ideas you wonder why no one has done before: these very cool and robust designs can be simply ironed on to fabric – clothes, bags or even shoes

gifts.name: Colour-in wallpaper
gifts.description: Rolls of wallpaper with illustrations by Jon Burgerman that you colour in yourself. Not sure if this is a gift or therapy, but it will go down a treat with children and adults alike

gifts.name: Dinosaur towel
gifts.description: Part cosy post-bath towel wrap, part dressing-up clothes, this dinosaur cape (or is it a dragon?) will delight little children. Does not include roaring noises

gifts.name: Donkey slippers
gifts.description: Very cute slippers made from Tibetan lambswool. Dyed using eco-friendly pigments and dried in the sun, they come in an organic cotton pouch

gifts.name: Build a volcano kit
gifts.description: Seedling make great educational and fun kits for kids. This one exploits the natural chemical reaction between baking soda and vinegar to allow them to safely erupt a volcano in the comfort of your home

gifts.name: Facemaker blocks
gifts.description: Miller Goodman makes toys that are modern design classics. This set of sustainable rubber-wood blocks will last years, and is just the sort of toy that gets stored in the attic for the next generation. Create characters and faces from the multi-faceted blocks

gifts.name: Reversible fleece
gifts.description: Frugi's gorgeous snuggle fleeces come in a variety of colours but all are reversible, cosy and warm

gifts.name: Tunnocks T-shirt
gifts.description: A Tunnock's teacake T-shirt? Not so much a description as a tongue twister. A great design that also comes in different colours and on a variety of different products for kids and adults alike

gifts.name: Angel wings
gifts.description: These wearable angel wings are really designed as decorations, but the temptation to adorn a grubby misbehaving child with them almost certainly will prove too much

gifts.name: Felt animal heads
gifts.description: Although these are designed for children's bedrooms, we won't tell if you know a grown-up who would love to provide a home for them. Made of felt, you can (ethically) hunt down a zebra, giraffe, elephant or tiger

gifts.name: Dungarees
gifts.description: Lovely design, robustly made and brilliantly practical, these unisex dungarees (Grubbies do also make denim dungaree dresses) should prove a favourite for kids and parents sick of camouflage print and/or princesses

gifts.name: Cushions
gifts.description: Fun and stylish designs suitable for all ages, ranging from birds on a check background to a "Private! Keep out!" cushion ideal for secretive teens. We like the poodle parlour and robot print best, though

gifts.name: Make a tube kit
gifts.description: The perfect gift not only to encourage imaginative play, but also use up all the cardboard boxes you've got lying around. This kit contains everything you need to turn boxes into a tube train. All the components are reusable so if the boxes get too battered, you can just put them back in the recycling and start again

gifts.name: Jigsaw world map
gifts.description: Lovingly made by hand, a great traditional toy that will be absorbing for small children and put some sneaky education in their heads while they are playing

gifts.name: Scooter accessories
gifts.description: If you've got a child under 10, chances are they've got a scooter already. So here's the next level: personalising it with a HobbyHead or a Zooter, turning it into a lion, dragon or horse. Kids will love it, and it'll make finding and identifying their scooter in the park that much easier

gifts.name: Mouse wardrobe play set
gifts.description: No picture can do justice to quite how adorable this toy is. It includes two little animals (Nini mouse and Sylvain rabbit, should you be on first-name terms) and an entire wardrobe of clothes to dress them in. The wardrobe itself is robust enough to cope with clumsy little fingers and closes into a suitcase so it can be carried around. And it will, everywhere they go

gifts.name: Farmhouse with market
gifts.description: You can't go wrong with a Playmobil set and this little farmhouse and shop is particularly charming. The vegetable and apples can even be harvested. If only the characters were wearing sandals and the sign said "Organic, free range", this would be the most Guardian toy ever

gifts.name: Bunny soft toy
gifts.description: This is Poppy Bunny. She is very sweet, very soft, and her cardigan can be removed and promptly lost. Sorry, we mean played with. And don't worry if you are thinking "White fur? Toddlers? Are you MAD" – she's machine washable

gifts.name: Dress
gifts.description: Featuring the adventures of Poppy and Fred and their trip to London (including a giraffe on a bus) these stunning dresses are proper heirloom pieces. Each frock is fully lined, made in England and comes with a little storybook in a bag

gifts.name: Princess and the pea
gifts.description: A play set in a box, this sweet toy comes with everything you need to re-enact this favourite childhood fairytale, including a fabric pea

gifts.name: Owl clock
gifts.description: Lovely felt and wood owl clock with a cheeky wink and a baby owl pendulum

gifts.name: Make your own fashion show
gifts.description: A great kit that lets children create and stage their own fashion shows after colouring in the models and spectators. And the poodle, of course. Does not include Anna Wintour or size-zero models. Well, the figures are very thin viewed from the side, I suppose

gifts.name: Sylvanian campervan
gifts.description: The more time you spend looking at Sylvanian families, the more you realise that they now have a far better quality of life than you. They even have their own mansion, but for when they feel like slumming it a bit, here's a very sweet retro campervan

gifts.name: Alpaca teddy bear
gifts.description: A super soft teddy made from alpaca fur (ethically sourced – you can read all about it on the website)

gifts.name: Unisex jumper
gifts.description: A soft, machine-washable wool/cashmere mix, this is a lovely winter jumper. All Tootsa MacGinty clothes are made for girls and boys

gifts.name: Saturn jacket
gifts.description: A funky zip-up towelling jacket, this retro-tastic top will please small planet watchers and star gazers

gifts.name: Play/sculpture set
gifts.description: A brilliant open-ended construction kit to create creatures, monsters or abstract art. You can also use it in the bath, and all pieces are interchangeable so you can buy new kits to add on

gifts.name: Beano annual
gifts.description: It's 75 years old this year, so introduce a new generation to the Beano or induce nostalgia in someone who has fond childhood memories of the Bash Street kids

gifts.name: Belle & Boo and the Goodnight Kiss
gifts.description: The charming tale of Belle and her toy rabbit's bedtime routine is perfect for reading out loud

gifts.name: Cardboard binoculars
gifts.description: Sweet pop-up binoculars – ideal for trying to spot Father Christmas and his reindeer in the Christmas sky

gifts.name: Diorama kits
gifts.description: A beautifully designed little kit to make your own circus or space scene – great for anyone over five

gifts.name: Chocolate coins
gifts.description: Anyone who doesn't like chocolate coins probably doesn't like Christmas. (Disclaimer: if you've got an allergy, we forgive you). These are fairly traded too, for added points with Father Christmas

gifts.name: Dr Seuss card game
gifts.description: A sweet and extremely reasonably priced game ideal for stockings. You get a set of three cards, read the sentence they generate then try to act out what it describes

gifts.name: Chameleon kit
gifts.description: All you need to create a little pipe-cleaner chameleon. For kids and chameleon-crafters from around eight years old. No upper age limit

gifts.name: Friendship bracelet kit
gifts.description: Friendship bracelets are back – or possibly they never went away, but I just got old. Anyway, this kit contains coloured threads, beads, safety pins and instructions to get knotting. Suitable from age six up

gifts.name: Money box
gifts.description: A sweet little tin money box – because you haven't spent enough on them already this Christmas, right?

gifts.name: Skipping rope
gifts.description: With gorgeous design, this good old-fashioned toy should help encourage a bit of activity to jump off an excess of Christmas sweets

gifts.name: Scoobits
gifts.description: Monster-themed reflective scooter accessories. As if a small child careering down the pavement like a pint-sized Boudicca in a slimline chariot isn't terrifying enough

gifts.name: Shadow puppets
gifts.description: A beautiful rendition of a traditional toy, with classic design appeal for all ages

gifts.name: Rory's story cubes
gifts.description: An incredibly simple idea but hugely absorbing and clever: each of the nine little dice has (naturally) six images. You toss them all, examine the pictures and start telling a story that eventually connects them all. With over 10 million combinations, you'll never run out of inspiration

gifts.name: Tiger mask
gifts.description: A lovely addition to a dressing-up basket, this mask is soft and furry so will be comfortable to wear for little heads

gifts.name: Leather boxing gloves
gifts.description: Float like a Christmas pudding-filled butterfly, sting like a stylishly attired bee

gifts.name: Cycling trouser straps
gifts.description: What to get the cyclist who has everything? A beautifully made leather trouser strap, which comes in a variety of lovely shades. Note: you only get one, because last time we looked, your bike only had one chain

gifts.name: Online photography course
gifts.description: A beautiful idea from two passionate photographers: an online film and photography school with a particular slant towards enabling you to capture your children's childhood. Get properly acquainted with your camera from the comfort of your home. Do go out to take photos though. You need some fresh air. You look a bit peaky

gifts.name: Eggling basil plant
gifts.description: This little egg contains everything you need to grow basil: just crack the ceramic shell, water, and watch it grow

gifts.name: Matchstick gardens
gifts.description: Tear out a matchstick, plant it tip first in soil and – fingers crossed – you'll soon have a little plant to nurture. You can chose from a range of wildflowers

gifts.name: Bird chimes
gifts.description: Lovely to hang on a balcony or in a garden, these bird chimes are made under fair-trade conditions

gifts.name: Pond dipping kit
gifts.description: A great gift to get children into nature – quite literally, if they have the right welly boots on, of course. Includes a handheld magnifier for up-close-and-personal views of multiple-legged critters. Don't say we didn't warn you

gifts.name: Welly boot garden
gifts.description: Sweet little ceramic welly boot in which you can plant your seeds – chose from wild strawberry, basil, mint or chamomile to encourage the development of little green fingers. As long as they wash them afterwards, of course

gifts.name: Seed packets
gifts.description: Not that we judge a seed by it's packet, of course, but these ones really are very beautiful … Great stocking fillers for keen gardeners (or those who love a good piece of graphic design)

gifts.name: Stainless steel water bottle
gifts.description: Stylish handmade eco-friendly bottles that will last years and years

gifts.name: Everyman pocket classics
gifts.description: We picked horse stories and those of motherhood, but there are many other classic literary compilations in the beautifully designed Everyman range

gifts.name: Paris eraser
gifts.description: For very stylish presents with a bias towards stationery, do browse the blog-shop hybrid that is nonesuchthings.com. Oo la la

gifts.name: Brooch
gifts.description: This is a very nice indeed Lovely pigeon brooch, so no sniping about flying rats, ok?

gifts.name: Retro milk bottle
gifts.description: Remember the days when one of these came at morning break in a crate (and always tastes slightly on the verge of going off)? Or did Margaret Thatcher nick yours? At any rate, these nostalgic bottles are a sweet stocking filler or would look lovely in a line on a shelf

gifts.name: Washi tapes
gifts.description: The only problem with this beautiful set of Washi (rice) paper tapes is that they are just too beautiful to actually use. Still, they'll look very stylish sitting on a shelf

gifts.name: Op-art notebook
gifts.description: If you are struggling for ideas for someone you don't know well, a notebook is always a good fallback option. This one is a very stylish and bold geometric version from the fabulous V&A shop

gifts.name: Wooden atom set
gifts.description: A truly beautiful wooden building set in its own box with which you can play scientist. Alas, does not come with accompanying and immediate in-depth knowledge of chemistry, but it is fantastically cool nevertheless

gifts.name: Wooden pencil case
gifts.description: If only your pencil case had been this cool when you were at school. The laser-cut wooden boxes (the pencils aren't included but there are gorgeous ones to buy on the site) could also be used for jewellery storage or other knick-knacks

gifts.name: Stylish stamps
gifts.description: You don't need to be a keen philatelist to appreciate the lovely design of this sheet of 1974 Christmas stamps. From Denmark and in mint condition, naturally

gifts.name: Perpetual calendar
gifts.description: A calendar that will last for ever. Or at least until the end of days

gifts.name: Squirrel tape dispenser
gifts.description: Very sweet wooden squirrel who will give you your tape if you give him acorns. OK, you don't actually have to give him acorns, which makes it even nicer, no?

gifts.name: Beautiful buttons
gifts.description: Fill a keen crafter's stocking with gorgeous buttons from Liberty or the V&A – the former comes in a jar with a handy pin-cushion lid, the latter are made from ceramic and feature Arts and Crafts patterns

gifts.name: Clangers craft
gifts.description: Give the gift of a Clanger. Or how to knit your own one, anyway. Remember Major and Mother? The Soup Dragon? Wipe away the tears of nostalgia and purchase

gifts.name: Padded jacket kit
gifts.description: A beautiful Clothkits original, this kit contains everything you need to make up the jacket, and includes a little set of toys to go with the farm theme. If you just love the design but don't fancy the hard work, you can also buy it pre-made

gifts.name: Dressmakers gift box
gifts.description: A lovely embossed and printed box containing more beautifully presented goodies for keen dressmakers and sewers, including scissors, pins, tailor's chalk and a tape measure

gifts.name: Sew your own fox/ tea towel
gifts.description: Leave as a lovely tea towel or follow the instructions and create a sweet stuffed fox toy with just a needle, thread and some stuffing

gifts.name: Granny gifts
gifts.description: A brilliant site where you can design your own scarf or hat, then chose which granny you would like to knit it for you. Gift vouchers are available, as is a new book full of top knitting tips

gifts.name: Fabric
gifts.description: What to get a whizz with needles or sewing machine? How about some luxury fabric. Hibou Home has some beautiful prints for children, or try Liberty's famous haberdashery department

gifts.name: Cross stitch kits
gifts.description: Cross stitch kits never used to be this stylish. What Delilah Did's designs are incredibly simple and chic – simple to look at, that is, not to make. This is the ideal gift for a crafter who has spare time and patience

gifts.name: Annual magazine subscription
gifts.description: Mollie Makes magazine is a beautifully produced treasure trove of craft projects, ideas and home-decor inspiration, unlike anything else on the market. There's also a digital edition and a new iPad app, Gathered by Mollie Makes

gifts.name: Christmas ribbon
gifts.description: Stylish festive ribbons designed by illustrator Alice Pattullo exclusively for Ray Stitch. Lovely for decorating, crafting or if you are feeling flush, adorning parcels with

gifts.name: Penguin kit
gifts.description: A cute little craft kit containing everything you need to create a family of three penguins from felt and buttons. Suitable for children over six, with some grown-up help. Or just let the grownups have some fun by themselves. Does not include: fish, ice, water

gifts.name: Rainy day craft bag
gifts.description: A sweet little bag that will be thoroughly appreciated one wet, windy, wintery day. It contains crafting materials for a variety of projects, from peg dolls to beach scenes. Just apply imagination

gifts.name: Knit your own hat
gifts.description: A luxury hat-knitting kit using super-soft alpaca wool – or, if you just love the style but couldn't knit your way out of a ball of wool, you can rent a wizard knitter to have it made up for you

gifts.name: Stylish knits
gifts.description: Knitting kits for those of a stylish bent – these fantastic kits from Wool and the Gang contain absolutely everything you need for the individual items, from the easy to the more advanced

gifts.name: App controlled helictoper
gifts.description: Possibly this is designed for kids, but they won't get a look in; it's far too enjoyable. Turn your smartphone (either iOS and Android – John Lewis has a good list of compatible phones) into an intuitive remote control and fly missions galore. Cleverly, the batteries are built in and chargeable via USB, so it won't go dead sometime on Christmas Day evening either

gifts.name: Lego campervan
gifts.description: First, the technical details: it's a replica of the classic Volkswagen T1 Camper Van from 1962. The details are incredible inside and out, with everything from gear stick to folding dining table lovingly rendered. Second, and more to the point, there is nothing more enjoyable and absorbing than assembling it. Give it as a gift and you'll not hear a peep from the recipient, bar the odd request for mulled wine

gifts.name: Personalised cases
gifts.description: Giant Sparrows has a range of particularly nice, arty smartphone covers, from Frida Kahlo to Hiroshige – but you can also upload a more personal image, from family photos to a pet dog, and get it printed out

gifts.name: Jessops Academy vouchers
gifts.description: A new range of courses at Jessops, with venues all across the UK, offers instruction in all sorts of areas from DSLR and compact cameras to wedding. Great gift for an enthusiastic amateur or someone looking to take it up professionally. Or, why not try one of the Guardian's very own masterclasses in photography?

gifts.name: IPad case
gifts.description: Simple stylish iPad cover from Kate Sheridan's lovely range, which also includes Kindle and laptop cases in a variety of colours

gifts.name: Windproofing for microphones
gifts.description: A brilliant gift for an enthusiastic amateur film-maker or dabbler, this mini muff (no sniggering at the back, thanks) will eliminate the problem of wind (stop it now) from the audio of films shot on DSLR

gifts.name: Nike+ FuelBand
gifts.description: The Nike+ FuelBand is somewhere between an activity monitor, a pedometer and a game. It measures your everyday activity and helps you hit a goal you've set yourself – and measure up against friends. It's also a pleasingly lovely piece of design: the bracelet lights up to give you progress or just the time, and it wirelessly syncs to the app on your iOS device. Ideal for a gadget-lover who wants to get moving

gifts.name: Harris tweed iPad sleeve
gifts.description: Hand woven, dyed and spun by islanders in the Outer Hebrides of Scotland, made from pure virgin wool. Because the best-dressed iPad deserves nothing less

gifts.name: Top quality headphones
gifts.description: Fantastic quality headphones at an extremely reasonable price, RHA designs and engineers all its range from its base in Glasgow. There are earphone models with remotes, but we particularly recommend the SA950i headphone model

gifts.name: iPad pen
gifts.description: A fantastic little stylus pen for the iPad, perfect for drawing apps but also a great chunky size for smaller hands

gifts.name: Laptop cases
gifts.description: Essentially a stylish coat for your laptop (Speck also does other cases for smartphones and tablets), this case comes in a range of great fabric-backed prints

gifts.name: Blinking bands
gifts.description: A handy gift for a keen runner or cyclist, these bands are reflective and have four blinking lights to help nighttime visibility and safety

gifts.name: Iphone covers
gifts.description: Lovely cases featuring designs by the talented Bristol artist Tom Frost. There are four designs celebrating British wildlife: an otter, an owl, a hare and a fox

gifts.name: Wool jumper
gifts.description: Super snuggly-warm wool jumper with a cotton lining in a classic design

gifts.name: Red clutch bag
gifts.description: If you're feeling generous and want to splash out on a designer gift, these beautiful leather clutch bags from Bora Aksu are just the ticket. An expensive ticket, we grant you, but a very stylish one

gifts.name: Collar
gifts.description: A beautiful velvet-and-ruffle collar from the treasure trove that is Boticca – browse it for a huge array of great independent designers and makers selling their wares from around the world

gifts.name: Roque leather bag
gifts.description: A beautiful leather laptop bag built to last, and named after the most famous cafe in Buenos Aires, apparently. The same company also makes some particularly stylist weekend/overnight bags

gifts.name: Canary scarf
gifts.description: This gorgeous silk and wool-blend scarf is from a new collection of scarves from Red Brick. The other prints are wonderful too

gifts.name: T-shirt
gifts.description: A striking and oh-so-fashionable print from Capcom at the great steadyguy.co.uk, which is offering 10% off everything just for you, loyal Guardian reader. Enter the code guardian10 – it will run until 31 December 2012

gifts.name: Cashmere gloves
gifts.description: Soft, snuggly cashmere gloves in a variety of lovely shades for men or women at a bargain price – you can't go wrong

gifts.name: Luxury knits
gifts.description: Beautiful, classic styles made in the Scottish Borders from super-soft lambswool. The gorgeous circle scarf can be wrapped around or left to hang loose. There are also matching gloves and mittens, and a fetching bobble hat. Will last years

gifts.name: Cycling purse
gifts.description: Screen-printed cotton canvas purse, featuring a very elegant lady cyclist, though we don't think that hat is entirely appropriate headwear

gifts.name: Organic jeans
gifts.description: These are not just any old jeans, these are jeans with a story. In short: Cardigan in Wales used to make 35,000 pairs a week, employing 400 people. Then the factory closed. The Hiut Denim Co decided to bring them back. Each pair also comes with a unique number. You go to the HistoryTag website and register, then follow their story. Lovely idea, beautifully made

gifts.name: Clever socks
gifts.description: Sorry, but it's a contractual obligation to include socks in every gift guide. These, though, are very clever socks. There's a thermal pair, a temperature-regulating pair and one to keep your toes cool. Socks that do everything bar wrap themselves up and put themselves under the tree

gifts.name: Outfit bundle
gifts.description: Ideal if you want to buy something more than a piece of clothing but no idea what goes with what. Hush sells a variety of bundles of its laidback, elegant classic designs

gifts.name: Satchel
gifts.description: A satchel that's far too cool for school, this geometric print style from Kate Sheridan is a great everyday size. Big enough for an iPad or large notebook, and can be carried from top handle or worn across the body

gifts.name: Grey T-shirt
gifts.description: A laidback wardrobe staple, made from hemp and cotton and manufactured under Fairtrade conditions

gifts.name: Weather rucksack
gifts.description: A bag collection based on the British obsession with the weather, the fabulous Laura Spring collection include duffels, pencil cases and capes. You could go for windy or warm designs, but we think wet is more British. All the products are hand-printed in the UK

gifts.name: Stylish scarf
gifts.description: Stunning photo-realistic print scarves from Rosso Forte made of modal – as soft as cashmere but with the distinct advantage of being washable. Stocked at Leggera Nell Aria (020-7352 7855)

gifts.name: Knitted collar
gifts.description: A handmade crochet collar to add to a plain jumper is a more original take on buying jewellery and this one is particularly fetching

gifts.name: Knitted scarf
gifts.description: Lightweight but very warm (it's made of alpaca wool) this stylish scarf is from one of Boticca's stable of talented independent designers

gifts.name: Clutch bag
gifts.description: Simple but oh-so-stylish, this clutch bag is fastened by the contrast strap, which wraps around.  Lined with cotton and with an interior pocket for coins, the bag is made in England from Italian vegetable-tan leather

gifts.name: Classic bag
gifts.description: This is Eric. To be honest, that was enough to catch our attention, but it (he?) also happens to be a timeless classic design that will last years and years and comes in a variety of colours. Produced in Manchester from Italian leather

gifts.name: Leather bag
gifts.description: If you want true quality but dislike designer names (and markups) then look no further than these beautifully made, vegetable-tanned leather bags. Made in a 19th-century Welsh methodist chapel by leather worker Gaynor Howell, they come in a variety of colours with contrast handles that can be replaced

gifts.name: Travel bag
gifts.description: Great vibrant travel bag for frequent flyers – it has wheels and a retractable handle and is just the size for weekend breaks

gifts.name: Leather slippers
gifts.description: A lovely simple pair of slippers made from reclaimed materials that would otherwise go to landfill. And £1 from each purchase is also donated to the homeless charity Emmaus, plus the slippers come in sizes for the entire family, from baby to bigfoot

gifts.name: Knitted tunic
gifts.description: Sweaty Betty is the place to look for stylish workout wear, but it also has some lovely more fashion-led items, like this knitted tunic. Perfect for staying warm after the yoga class you meant to go to, but didn't

gifts.name: Print pyjamas
gifts.description: You can't get cosier than flannel PJs, and these ones come in a really lovely print

gifts.name: Luxury satchel
gifts.description: Tusting has been working with leather since 1875, so it stands to reason that it has got pretty darn good at it. The company produces some gorgeous, traditional bags for men and women. This satchel (a smaller size that will fit an A4 book) is particularly lovely

gifts.name: Overnight bag
gifts.description: Style without fuss, this great overnight bag comes with accessories too: a mesh toiletries bag, to make going through customs easier, plus a laptop sleeve and a pouch for cables. All of them attach to the inside and are interchangeable with other bags from the same company

gifts.name: Goose case
gifts.description: Honk! A cute little pencil case which would also double as a little makeup bag. Printed and wipe-clean

gifts.name: Perfect timing
gifts.description: What to get the teen who is never on time? A bit of pampering with a not-very-subtle hint attached: this bubble wash and body lotion kit comes with an alarm clock. For them to sleep through

gifts.name: Wash bag
gifts.description: Great screen-printed washbag; perfect for men or women

gifts.name: Nails it
gifts.description: Brilliantly packaged nail varnishes – each pill-shaped trio comes in a pharmaceutical style jar. Perfect prescription

gifts.name: Washing up
gifts.description: Embroidered cotton wash bags in lovely bright prints made under fair-trade conditions

gifts.name: Super smellies
gifts.description: You can't go wrong with Jo Malone scented candles or scents, and the pine and eucalyptus scent is particularly lovely and festive

gifts.name: Luxury scent
gifts.description: All Miller Harris scents are unisex, but we think this luxurious Mediterranean-inspired scent is particularly good for men, with a sort of floral-patchouli mix that's bold and unusual

gifts.name: Have a hoot
gifts.description: An owl necklace that also doubles as a lip balm – you just open the secret compartment and help yourself. You can also buy refills on the site

gifts.name: Smelling of roses
gifts.description: For someone who prefers their beauty as pure as possible, Ren has a wonderful range of rose-scented gifts. Top quality, beautifully packaged

gifts.name: Nailed to the tree
gifts.description: Double up your decorations with your gifts: these sparkly nail varnishes, perfect for teens, come with little wings and a loop to hang from the tree

gifts.name: Hero products
gifts.description: Trilogy has been going for 10 years, and has got pretty good at this beauty lark. This set includes some wonderful natural products

gifts.name: Yes please nurse
gifts.description: Yes! Nurse was founded by a young paediatric nurse as a natural treatment for busy, dry hands. It comes in a beautifully designed little box, and looks far more expensive than it is. It's also available as a subscription, so you can gift a tube a month to some hands in need

gifts.name: Angelic mice
gifts.description: These sweet little mice can be hung up as decorations or just loved as toys

gifts.name: DIY decorations
gifts.description: A small amount of fun, glue-and-scissors crafting will make up this gang of festive animals. Use as decorations, name places on the Christmas table or hang from the tree

gifts.name: Milk crate with roses
gifts.description: Fed up with poinsettias? Here's a charming and more lasting alternative; a lovely little retro milk crate which you can add seasonal flower to

gifts.name: Postcard nativity
gifts.description: Sweet little set of five postcards to cut out and make your own nativity scene

gifts.name: Garland art
gifts.description: Either a beautiful bargain or a DIY decoration, this set of three limited-edition prints by the talented Alice Pattullo can be cut up and made into festive garlands. Or just framed and admired

gifts.name: Reindeer vase
gifts.description: A festive but also very tasteful reindeer from Georgina Fowler – who also makes great ceramic jewellery

gifts.name: Paper angels
gifts.description: Use as place settings (just write the name in the middle) or decorations

gifts.name: Tasteful tree
gifts.description: A stunning 6ft 8in Japanese-style inspired tree. If Christmas were always this tasteful, even Scrooge wouldn't object

gifts.name: Sticky labels
gifts.description: Handy little sticky labels so you'll not get the presents confused – and won't have to Sellotape your fingers to the parcels while trying to attach the tags. Or is that just me?

gifts.name: Christmas centrepiece
gifts.description: A lovely first christmas gift or for a young child, this centrepiece will last years. Until you realise you're getting it out for yourself and the kids left home about a decade ago

gifts.name: Paper wreath
gifts.description: Very elegant and simple wreath made from recycled carboard laser-cut into leaves. Comes flatpacked – you just assemble yourself at home following simple instructions. You can decorate it, but we like it just the way it is

gifts.name: Advent calendar
gifts.description: No chocolate within sight but instead a lovely idea – each windows gives you a piece of Playmobil and by 25 December, you'll have a full Christmas scene

gifts.name: Stylish pencil
gifts.description: Super-compact and super-stylish mechanical pencil designed especially for pockets. Comes in pink, orange or silver

gifts.name: Christmas stencil
gifts.description: Feel like making your own minimalist, but nevertheless festive, cards? Or stenciling on brown paper to make cool wrapping paper? This will do the trick – or just display on a shelf

gifts.name: Real boys
gifts.description: If we tell you that we love these little Pinocchio pins, we can assure you that our nose is not growing any longer. Fabulous little limited-edition stationery stocking-fillers

gifts.name: Colour in decorations
gifts.description: Lovely little illustrated tree decorations that pop straight out of the pack – just add their ribbon and hang. The reverse is left plain for children to colour in themselves

gifts.name: Colourful baubles
gifts.description: Seek and Adore is a great place to look for unusual and stylish tree decorations. This pack of five brightly coloured baubles are handpainted but won't fade, so will adorn your tree for years to come

gifts.name: Screenprinted tags
gifts.description: Depending on how generous you are with your Christmas presents, this beautiful set of tags should last you a couple of years. Save them for special people, they are almost too good to use

gifts.name: Sticky skylines
gifts.description: These wonderful tapes feature the skylines of Paris, London and New York. You could use them for very stylish wrapping paper, but they are really too good to waste on other people

gifts.name: Hokusai wave decoration
gifts.description: A decoration with a difference – these wonderful little DIY sets from Noted revive the largely forgotten 17th-century Japanese art of creating detailed dioramas from paper

gifts.name: Arty cards
gifts.description: Gorgeous print Christmas cards featuring festive creatures, though we're not sure the turkey is destined for a merry 25 December. Box of 12

gifts.name: Cool cushion
gifts.description: A quirky and eye-catching take on the peacock, this cushion is designed and digitally printed in the UK

gifts.name: Bird prints
gifts.description: Wonderful bird prints from artist Chris Andrews, with a distinctly 1950s feel to them

gifts.name: Handmade jugs
gifts.description: Hand-thrown bird-tailed little jugs in glazed stoneware, these are dishwasher safe and come in brown or white glazes

gifts.name: Tasty cushions
gifts.description: Try not to drool over these briliant screen-printed biscuit cushions. They come in a variety of tasty flavours and colours

gifts.name: Circus print
gifts.description: If only, if only. Striking monochrome graphic print by Swedish duo Anki Josefsson & Anneli Sandström

gifts.name: Cake stand
gifts.description: A beautiful cake stand featuring work by André Marty (1882-1974), known for his fashion plates for Vogue and deluxe book illustrations

gifts.name: Slow news subscription
gifts.description: Perfect gift for someone who would really rather you got off the internet and stopped looking at this. Yes, you. Delayed Gratification is a quarterly publication from The Slow Journalism Company, each issue distilling three months of news into one entirely non digital delight

gifts.name: Edinburgh house
gifts.description: OK, not an actual house, but a fabulous kit to make your own, based on buildings found around the High Street and Grassmarket in Edinburgh from the 16th and 17th centuries

gifts.name: Enamel bowls
gifts.description: Lovely little metal and enamel bowls hand-painted by artisans from Kashmir. Food safe, but not for the dishwasher

gifts.name: Espresso set
gifts.description: A coffee set inspired by backgammon games. Magpie also has some other lovely graphic designs for coffee connoisseurs

gifts.name: Book on a poster
gifts.description: Put your reading glasses on. These amazing posters contain the entire text of a book – anything from Austen to the Finn Family Moomintroll. Even War and Peace, if you have very large walls

gifts.name: Games compedium
gifts.description: A great gift for a whole family, nicely packaged in one wooden box and including six classic board games (chess, draughts, backgammon, solitaire, snakes and ladders, and tiddlywinks)

gifts.name: Salad days
gifts.description: Lovely bone and horn salad servers for a stylish kitchen

gifts.name: Porcelain cups
gifts.description: Handleless ceramic cups with oak lids – maybe not the most practical thing for a cuppa, but far too nice to use everyday anyway. Would look lovely on a shelf, or used as little storage jars

gifts.name: Wise old owl
gifts.description: Quirky and richly coloured designs from Lush, this lampshade comes in small, medium or large

gifts.name: Mermaid print
gifts.description: A beautiful work of art is a true luxury gift. This print by artist Cornelia O'Donovan is from a limited edition of only 26. Not at all fishy

gifts.name: Modern classics
gifts.description: Stunning prints from Orwell and Goode adorn these lampshades, but you can also browse the cushions, prints, wallpaper and more moderately priced items such as tea towels and totes

gifts.name: Owl jars
gifts.description: Quirky owl storage jars for the kitchen – the tall thin one is possibly the world's only spaghetti-eating owl

gifts.name: Don't be a mug
gifts.description: Charming mugs from Poppy Children featuring its lovely prints. Perfect for parents or grandparents who love a good cuppa

gifts.name: Potter posters
gifts.description: We are so smitten with the Printorium's limited-edition Harry Potter collection we suspect someone has placed a charm on us. The range is the work of talented design duo Miraphora Mina and Eduardo Lima, who created many of the film's best props, and includes brilliant Marauder's Map and Yule Ball posters

gifts.name: Lambswool luxury
gifts.description: This beautiful blanket from Seasalt in a heritage knit is wonderful for snuggling up on the sofa. Soft as a lamb newly washed and tumble-dried, not that we would suggest doing that, of course

gifts.name: Rabbiting away
gifts.description: Charming cork-backed rabbit melamine coasters for the kitchen table. Placemats are £42 for four, coasters £18 for four

gifts.name: Flower garland
gifts.description: Delicate garland of elegant paper flowers, handmade by a co-operative in Nepal

gifts.name: Kyoto mugs
gifts.description: Pretty enough to use just as a decoration, these mugs would also be lovely for sipping green tea

gifts.name: Tea or coffee pot
gifts.description: Stylish enamel pot for the caffeinated beverage of your choice. The mugs are sold separately and cost £5.95

gifts.name: Winter trees
gifts.description: Beautifully designed and simple cushions, with black embroidery on natural Yorkshire-milled linen

gifts.name: A girl and her pig
gifts.description: The long-awaited first cookbook from April Bloomfield, co-owner of three of New York's favourite restaurants. As you'll guess from the table, the emphasis is on nose-to-tail eating and with a British-Italian mix of flavours

gifts.name: Bread-baking kit
gifts.description: A lovely way to get kids into bread baking – these kits contain everything you need to make a fun loaf with a difference, with heart shapes running through every slice. The kit includes a tin and shapers, so after you've run out of mix you can just restock from the website

gifts.name: Box of treats
gifts.description: Looking for a wonderful gift for grazers and gourmets? You can subscribe them to a Flavrbox, and every month they will get a beautifully packed and very tasty box of goodies from independent producers in the UK

gifts.name: Gin for joy
gifts.description: It's a ginvent calendar. Seriously, what more do you need to know, people?

gifts.name: Cutie chops
gifts.description: Sweetly simple, these little chopping boards are perfect for keen little cooks. There's a cat, a bear, and a rabbit, with other matching items – we particularly like the rabbit egg cup

gifts.name: Yo ho ho and a bottle of ...
gifts.description: Even if this didn't turn out to be wonderful black spiced rum, we'd be totally smitten by the bottle anyway. Luckily, it lives up to the wonderful packaging. No more shivering of timbers, though possibly some unsteady walking of the plank

gifts.name: Molecular gastronomy kit
gifts.description: Unleash the inner Heston in a friend. Just make sure it's not on a night you are invited round to dinner, unless you really fancy garden snail porridge

gifts.name: Patissier's hamper
gifts.description: The perfect gift for anyone who is leafing mournfully through their Paul Hollywood recipe books and missing Mary Berry like an absent grandmother. Everything you need to make top-quality patisseries at home, except for Paul's steely-eyed gaze and Mary's gentle guidance

gifts.name: Perfect pies
gifts.description: There are no fewer than five pie dishes in these vintage-style sets. Should satisfy even the most ardent piemaker

gifts.name: Pizza perfection
gifts.description: Start nurturing your own little pizzaiolo at home with this kit. Includes tray, lifter, rolling pin, sauce brush and recipes. Does not include: Neopolitan sunshine, buffalo, tomato plants

gifts.name: Have a hamper
gifts.description: A hamper of goodies for a health-conscious friend or family member. They can graze smugly on raw goodness while you scoff mince pies and chocolate – or you can browse the less wholesome but decidedly delicious alternatives

gifts.name: Chocolate heaven
gifts.description: Beautifully produced recipe book from the exclusive chocolatier Rococo

gifts.name: Teacake apron
gifts.description: Wonderful apron with the iconic Tunnock's teacake design, printed on organic cotton. Gift for the sweetest chef

gifts.name: Make your pud
gifts.description: A lovely gift which you can even help eat, this pudding bowl with a sweet cloth wrapping over the lid contains everything you need to make up a delicious Christmas pudding. It even includes a “make a wish” sixpence

gifts.name: Recycled gems
gifts.description: Joanna Cave uses recycled metal and thread, all sourced from her base in Greece, to make beautiful wearable pieces

gifts.name: Lovely locket
gifts.description: Wonderfully designed little mountain scene on an openable locket. Gold-plated chain with an additional little charm

gifts.name: Autumn leaves
gifts.description: Lovely pair of mismatched (deliberately, we hasten to add) enamel-glazed earrings

gifts.name: Tree stand
gifts.description: Sweet little jewellery tree from which to hang the most treasured or used pieces

gifts.name: Cuff up
gifts.description: Beautifully made brass, gold and leather bracelet with an almost sculptural feel

gifts.name: Statement style
gifts.description: A great statement piece, hand-knitted in the UK from organic, fairly traded cotton and finished with a vintage ribbon

gifts.name: Buzz box
gifts.description: Perfect for jewellery, this little ceramic trinket box would be a charming stocking filler or a gift for a teen

gifts.name: Personalised jewellery
gifts.description: All of the beautifully made pieces from Chambers & Beau, from sterling-silver keys to leather wraps with silver beads, can be personalised with initials, dates or your own little message. Special gifts to treasure for a very lucky recipient

gifts.name: Cool cuff
gifts.description: A very chic and simple white leather cuff with chevron detailing

gifts.name: Pea perfection
gifts.description: Stunning gold pea-pod necklace with mirror writing inspired by Leonardo's own script. Luxury but with a quirky appeal

gifts.name: What a cracker
gifts.description: A festive perspex gem from Tatty Devine's wonderful collection. Perfect place to browse for gifts for teens, too.

gifts.name: Animal charm
gifts.description: Beautifully made little animal pendants at a great price. Laser cut on cherry veneered wood

gifts.name: Bob a job
gifts.description: Charming little illustrated black and white brooch featuring fisherman Bob. We like Bob.
gifts.manufacturer: CultureLabel.com x Of Cabbages and Kings

gifts.name: Make a splash
gifts.description: An elegant, enamelled necklace with an art deco feel. Howkapow also stocks an array of lovely design-led gifts, so have a good browse of the site

gifts.name: Crochet magic
gifts.description: Robins, holly, snowflakes – so passé. What your tree needs is some crochet - check out the site's risqué mermaid. Handmade in a fair-trade project focusing on empowering women in South Africa

gifts.name: Smart shirt
gifts.description: Shirts smart enough for any office (the company makes both formal and more casual styles), and beautifully made from organic fairly traded cotton. A unique company and a lovely product

gifts.name: Super shoes
gifts.description: A luxury gift for a budding designer (or someone who can never find just the right pair of shoes) – at Upper Street's website you can design your own, choosing from a huge range of fabrics and materials, styles and heel heights

gifts.name: Tones and shades
gifts.description: Who doesn't need a pair of headphones to match their every outfit? Well, maybe just one outfit then. Urbanears range of earphones and headphones come in a rainbow of pleasing shades

gifts.name: Gnaw on that
gifts.description: A Christmas pudding you won't want to share with anyone

gifts.name: Snug as a bug
gifts.description: Luxury for little ones: though keeping warm in freezing weather is obviously more of a necessity than a luxury, Spotty Otter does it in style. Beautifully designed with all the attention to detail you'd expect for an outdoor range, but in miniature sizes. Great for those in chilly climes

gifts.name: Fuzzy pizza
gifts.description: Fuzzy felt will never go out of fashion, and this is a lovely spin on it: a pizza box that comes with a pizza-shaped book and 50 felt pieces. Kids can play and then make the real thing from the recipes that are included

gifts.name: Disappointing diary
gifts.description: Featuring wonderfully downbeat pages allowing you to note down 'Ideas you will never follow up' and 'People you own money', this diary is a cheeringly depressing stocking filler

gifts.name: Lace beauty
gifts.description: Absolutely beautiful cardigan from delicate Scottish lace – all Minna garments are made using environmentally friendly techniques. A wardrobe classic. Can you tell this is top of my wishlist?

gifts.name: Wolf brooch
gifts.description: Made from fur scraps, Walter is sold in Minna's kids section but we think he's big enough and bad enough to hang out with adults

gifts.name: DJ Puss
gifts.description: OK, it's unlikely that your cat will take to DJing in a big way, but whack a bit of catnip on the turntable and you'll at least get an amusing photograph out of it

gifts.name: Luxury beds
gifts.description: These gorgeous cushions are handmade from vintage Welsh blankets. Perfect for the truly pampered pooch or kitty

gifts.name: Fish cat bowl
gifts.description: Contains two removable, dishwasher-safe stainless steel bowls. Available in a range of colour, plus a bone design for dogs

gifts.name: Non-revolting pheasant
gifts.description: What every animal-loving peaceful dog needs: a squeaky pheasant toy to maul in the knowledge that no wildlife is being harmed

gifts.name: Doggy bag
gifts.description: What to get the pampered pooch who has everything? Possibly a course at a dog-training centre would be the ticket, but if you must spoil them, make like Paris Hilton and tote them round in a, um, tote

gifts.name: Tweed coat
gifts.description: Keep a dapper dog looking stylish and warm this Christmas

gifts.name: Cat laser toy
gifts.description: For design-loving cats who can't bear the cutsie stuffed-mouse vibe

gifts.name: Pudding bed
gifts.description: Don't forget your tiniest little friends this Christmas. Though to be honest, if they made this adult-sized, we'd buy one for ourselves and hibernate until March

gifts.name: Radiator bed
gifts.description: A cosy bed/hiding place that hangs off a radiator for extra warmth and snuggliness. Who wouldn't want this? Well, aside from any contrarian cat. Which is pretty much all of them, isn't it?

gifts.name: Codfather gift set
gifts.description: Tuxedo-clad fish containing catnip. Get these, then leave a toy horse's head in your cat's bed?

gifts.name: Hug a hoodie
gifts.description: Dress up your dog for Christmas. Comes in a range of canine sizes. Not included: dog, expression of resigned but deep despair

gifts.name: Green hair
gifts.description: This great-value range from Faith in Nature is paraben-free and perfect for green stockings

gifts.name: Lovely animal frocks
gifts.description: Wonderful little handmade dresses from Wild Things – there are an array of adorably cute animals to chose from. The dresses are robust, stand up well to repeated washing and will charm parents and small people alike

gifts.name: Junior masterchef
gifts.description: Great stocking fillers for little creative cooks, Tala's retro-inspired baking range for kids includes cookie cutters, mini whisks and a measuring jug

gifts.name: Wonderful wallets
gifts.description: Really beautifully made wallets inspired by musician-owner Ryan Barr's love of vintage guitars. It has a unique little pocket for a guitar pick as well as slots for all your less musical stuff. The Wanted Wallets site also has tonnes of other unusual brands, so do browse for other ideas

gifts.name: Cycle in style
gifts.description: Beautifully cut and designed apparel designed with cyclists in mind, this long sleeve merino jersey may be perfect for riding, but is also stylish enough for all-day wear. Vulpine also make women's riding wear

gifts.name: Sleepy time
gifts.description: Want to make sure you don't wake up when Father Christmas is delivering the presents? Then make sure this is hanging on the tree. Gentle lavender-infused balm to relax even the most over-excited mind

gifts.name: Dinosaur island
gifts.description: Fabulous little self-assembly kit including waterfall, trees, volcano and dinosaurs. Not including: roaring noises, screaming

gifts.name: Crochet rattles
gifts.description: Adorable little crocheted rattles that you won't mind being whacked over the head with, and can cope with some gummy chewing, too

gifts.name: Cashmere scarf
gifts.description: For modern, understated but beautifully made classics for both men and women, head to Loft Design By. Gorgeous wardrobe staples

gifts.name: Beautiful brownies
gifts.description: The squidgiest, tastiest brownies and most mouth-watering chocolate imaginable, all wrapped up in lovely gift sets to send by mail. Send them direct or you'll end up drooling all over the packaging, which is not a good festive look

gifts.name: Simple watches
gifts.description: A rainbow of shades to satisfy all tastes, these simple watches come in packaging inspired by the tuna can. Something to remember on the morning commute. Or is that sardines?

gifts.name: Mulled wine sachets
gifts.description: It's a miserable Scrooge indeed who doesn't love a mug of mulled wine at Christmas. These lovely little spice bouquets make the process easier. Just add wine, and orange juice and brandy if you prefer

gifts.name: Commuter kit
gifts.description: The perfect gift for someone who spends way too much time on public transport. Or indeed in their own car. The Aeropress means they can brew up delicious coffee on the go. The kit comes with a cup, the press, a particularly nice coffee blend and a tea towel, in case of accidents

gifts.name: Yorkshire hamper
gifts.description: Food hampers are 10 a penny but this one is really special. Full of sweet treats from Lottie Shaw, including some wonderfully fiery parkin biscuits, a dangerously moreish fruitcake and some light and tasty mince pies. And that's just for starters

gifts.name: Decadent delight
gifts.description: The chocolate connoisseur in your life is not going to be happy with a box of Quality Street, are they? Impress them instead with this gift box from premium brand La Maison du Chocolat. It blends traditional festive flavours – spices, praline, champagne with the purest of chocolate. Yum

gifts.name: Lovely notebooks
